content: dear crochet friend thank you for liking my pattern due to neck and arm pain i stopped crochet designing indefinitely i appreciate you still supporting me it really means a lot ♡ so i decided to turn lemons into lemonade and wrote a crochet book about how to write design and sell crochet patterns since i m unable to crochet at this time this is my way of sharing and continuing my passion for crochet with you please check out my crochet books on amazon ♡ crochet your way to a buyer s heart with amigurumi us link https //tinyurl com/bdcr99k9 global link 8 seconds delay https //www bklnk com/b0bw2vkr2d the student becomes the amiguru crochet master us link https //tinyurl com/2t57psz6 global link 8 seconds delay https //www bklnk com/b0bwdg89j4 thank you for your support with much gratitude and appreciation elisa now onto the pattern 1 hiccup the tabby cat lying down tabby cat crochet pattern skill level ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ easy intermediate © pattern design by @crochetneverstops 2021 2 hello introductions from crochetneverstops hi crochet buddy thank you for liking my pattern ● tag me @crochetneverstops on your social media accounts and share with your friends ♡ ● please leave a review and include a photo of your masterpiece it would mean a lot to me ♡ youtube channel on pause https//www youtube com/channel/ucfvdohhgr0f9p3dghglygsg if you have any questions wish to share feedback or just want to say hello feel free to contact me ♡ ~elisa crochetneverstops@gmail com enjoy and have fun now let s get started ♡ skill level ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ ♡ easy intermediate materials 2 75mm - 3 00 mm crochet hook a pair of 8 mm safety eyes tapestry needle poly fiber fill premium 100% cotton yarn medium weight yarn other items stuff as you go place a stitch marker in the beginning of each round abbreviations and symbols u s terminology and standards magic_ring = magic_ring decrease = decrease where i use invisible decrease st or st = stitch es blo = back loop only chain = chain flo = front loop only slip_stitch = slip_stitch round = round single_crochet = single_crochet r = row half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet ** ** = in the same stitch repeat instructions in asterisk double_crochet = double_crochet x = repeat instructions in the parenthesis x times treble_crochet = treble_crochet x sts = total number of stitches increase = increase 3 i used two colors for my tabby or striped cat adjust colors to your liking tail round 1 start with your initial color chain 2 then 4 single_crochet into the first chain 4 sts round 2 increase x4 = 8 sts round 3 - round 4 8 sts round 5 - round 7 change to another color 8 sts 3 rounds of color b -lightly stuff the tip of the tail round 8 - round 10 change color 8 sts 3 rounds of color a round 11 - round 13 change color 8 sts 3
